metadata.Title: CVE-2010-0187

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for AMD64 and Intel EM64T
SUSE Linux Enterprise Desktop 10 SP3 for x86

metadata.Description: Adobe Flash Player before 10.0.45.2 and Adobe AIR before 1.5.3.9130 allow remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) via a modified SWF file.
